string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now...
{0} has started a football season! Join to play some football... or foul everyone until you win!
A new football tournament has been started by {0}! Join to play football!
{0} has started a football tournament! But it seems, this one will be more chaotic. Join to play some football... or foul everyone until you win!
A chaotic football tournament has been started by {0}! Join to play football!
You can't join now! The game is already running.
You've already joined!
1 minute left to Join
{0} seconds left to Join
Odd... football players earn millions but not enough players available. Tournament canceled.
Football tournament is starting, please wait while the trainers decide on which position you will play!
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, max football player limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Please click the start button below or {1} and start me, so I can PM you your role. You may not join the game until you do.
You can't run away! YOU'RE DEAD! Get back in the ground... jeez!
{0} decided he needs to go train more and has left this football season..
{0} players remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to foul {1}.
{0} has voted to give a red card to {1}.
{0} did not try to find any offenders for 2 games in a row. The fifa commitée cannot accept that and has decided to kick him out of the tournament. {1}
You were the looser. Now that every offender is dead, you decided to take revenge for all the bad publicity yourself and become an offender!
Choice accepted.
\nThe reporter is {0}.
{0} was the reporter. As his assistant, you step up and become the reporter yourself.
{0} was the assistant. Now that the reporter had to leave this tournament {0} fills {1}'s place as the new Reporter.
You focus your news report on {0} and find out he is {1}!
Who do you want to give a red card to?
Who do you want to interview?
Who do you want to kick out of the team? {0} choice(s) remain.
Which person to you want to support this game?
Who do you want to focus your news report on?
Who do you want to keep save from any fouls?
Who do you want to foul?
Who do you want to investigate?
Who is your best buddy?
Who do you want to convert to a hooligan?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and

You are the Bench Player (😾). Most matches the trainer doesn't let you play. If the offenders try to foul you, they will realize you are frustrated enough to join them and you will become an offender yourself.
You are the interviewer (🕵️). Between matches you can interview one of the football player. But watch out because the offenders may find out. (40% chance)
You are the line referee (🍺). You don't pay attention to the matches just like your boss but if one of the offenders fouls you, you will make sure to give them a yellow card.

You are the goalkeeper (👼). Because your reflexes are super high, you cannot only guard your goal but also one specific player each match. However, if you want to guard an offender, there is a chance he will kick you in the knees. (50%)
You are the captain (🔫). As the team leader, the trainer gives you the choice to kick someone out of the team between matches two times.

You are the middle fielder (💋). Your position during matches is very flexible but you are a bit lazy. So you decide to support one person for each match and that person only. But if you try to support an offender, he will make sure to foul you.

You are the looser (🖕)! No one really likes you, you regularly get bad publicity and you want revenge. But as long as offenders are in the competition, you see no reason to step up yourself. Only when they all are out, you will become an offender yourself.
You are an offender (🐺). The easiest way to win the tournament is fouling everyone out. Every match you can foul someone and they will be out for the rest of the tournament.
You are the reporter (👳). Your main goal is to uncover undergoing networks of bullies and offenders, who are trying to win the tournament by cheating.
You are a football player (👱), trying to do your job and play football.

You are the injured player (👺). If someone tries to give you a red card, the crowd will be angered with the display and boycott the tournament. But you will get lots of gift cards and money, so you will win.

You are the best buddy (👶). You and your best buddy have been playing football together since you are little and lucky, you got into the same team. But if your buddy dies, you see no reason to play fair anymore and join to offenders.
You are the camera man (👁), faithful assistant of the reporter. Of course, you know the real reporter!
You are the reporter's assistant (🙇). If the reporter cannot do his job anymore, you will step up and become the reporter yourself.
You are a hooligan (👤). You like violence and pyrotechnics. You can convince other people to do so too until only hooligans are left standing and the tournament is ruined.
You are the policeman (💂), trying to take care of every match and arresting the hooligans. Every match, you can investigate one person and find out if they are hooligans or not.
The next football match is coming closer. The football-community has to decide which person they want to give a red card to for the rest of the tournament! You have {0} seconds to discuss.
It is now after the match. Before the next match starts, the football community has to decide which one of them should receive a red card. You have {0} seconds.
A new football match has started. Everyone heads to the stadium to see a brilliant and hopefully fair game... Football players have {0} seconds for interactions.
The football community has decided who must be the offender. {0} has gotten a red card and leaves the tournament. {1}
Democracy didn't help the football community this time. Their vote is balanced, they cannot decide who the offender is. No red cards for anyone....
Something is fishy, for no one voted!...

The football players come from the field exhausted, only to find {0} lying unconsciously on the brick, papers of his trusty notebook scattered everywhere. Seems like the offenders didn't like being interviewed.
In the changing room someone notices {0} is missing. They go back onto the field, only to find him lying next to the goal with a bruise on his head.
As the players enter the shower they find {0} lying in them, the captain's apron stuffed in his mouth. The offenders didn't even stop with their own captain!

The football players go from the field, expecting to be interviewed by {0} immediately, only to find him beaten up in front of the camera. Sadly, the offenders made sure to disable it before hurting the reporter.

While playing the next football game, one of the players notices someone standing in an offside position. He tries to complain to the line referee, only to find him beaten up at the side. But what's this? {0} has a yellow card in the hand... No fouling for the offenders next game!
As the football players leave the field, they see {0} on the ranks, his trusty Canon broken besides him. Seems like the offenders mistook the hobby filmer for the actual reporter.
As everyone heads out of the stadium, they see {0} lying in the bushes, covered in his own blood. {1}.
Loud sirens can be heard, even shots, as the police arrests {0}. He will get a stadium ban forever. One of the hooligan has been found out.
The players leave the stadium, happy to see that no one was fouled last game.
The offenders wanted to foul you but they noticed your frustration and asked you to join them. You gladly accept, joining the offenders.
Your offender teammate(s): {0}
{0} was the Bench Player. Due to his frustration, he joined you! Congrats on your new teammate!
While playing, you suddenly feel great pain in your knee! You've got fouled by the offenders.
As you foul {0}, he falls to the ground, only to take out a yellow card moments before he becomes unconscious. Oh no! {0} was the line referee!
You tried to protect a player, only to be hit on the head from behind.
While watching your goal, you see a shadow running towards {0}. You jump over the whole field to get there in time! The offender is so impressed from the display, he walks away before fouling {0}.
You watch {0} but there was no one trying to foul him.
You try to watch over {0} but you cannot find him on the football field!
You play the game of your life, as suddenly the goalkeeper leaves his position and jumps right in front of you! The ball goes into said goal but you were saved from the offenders!
Seems like the middle fielder decided to support no one last game...! Bad decision. The offenders found {0} on his position and beat him up badly.
You try to foul {0} but you cannot find his position..!
You want to support {0} but as you both watch out for the ball, he kicks you in the back. You got fouled.
The middle fielder tried to support the wrong player last game. {0} got fouled last game!
{0} wanted to support {1} last game. The offenders decided to foul {1}. As they see {0} standing next to him, they decided to foul him too.
You have a good game, supporting {0} on his position and getting every ball towards the enemies goal.
Last game, one of the middle fielders decided to support you on your position, making your game so much easier.
While on a press conference, you see {0} interviewing some of the players, asking intriguing questions.
You interview {0} and find out he is {1}.
The captain didn't like the middle fielders decisions on who to support. {0} kicks {1} out of the team.
The captain {0} goes to the trainer, telling him he wants {1} out of the team. {1} has to leave. {2}
The offenders have taken over the tournament!
The offenders have taken over the tournament!
Fairness always wins! The tournament is back on track, with all offenders gone!
As the injured player doesn't come back for the next match, the crowds abandon the tournament but the injured wins!
Remaining living football players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to make {1} into a hooligan.
{0} was sent to persuade {1} to become a hooligan only to be confronted with a weapon and hand cuffs. He is arrested and cannot go into stadiums ever again.
{0} wanted you to become a hooligan but you take your weapon out and arrest him instead! {1} hooligans remain!

The hooligans convinced you that football is a waste of time and beating people up is the better sport. So you have become one of them. Every game, you can convince another person to become a hooligan too.
Hooligans: {0}
{0} has decided violence is good, football is bad and joined the hooligans!
{0} has joined the hooligans!
You wanted {1} to become a hooligan so you sent {0} to convince him. However, {0} couldn't find him on his usual position.
Every football player, offender or not, has been banned from the stadium. Only people inside the stadium left are the hooligans! They destroyed the tournament and won!
You wanted {0} to become a hooligan but he got fouled and you deem him too weak now.
You take a look at {0} and see a Molotov cocktail in his hand. Before he can harm anyone, you make sure to arrest him.
You take a look at {0} but he is no hooligan and you have an awesome talk about how great football is.
{0}'s best buddy just had to leave the tournament. Furious, {0} has decided to join the offenders!
{0}just had to leave the competition. Furious and without purpose, you join the offenders! Your new teammates are: {1}
a Field Player 👱 (👱)
the Line Referee 🗣 (🍺)
the Middle Fielder 👷‍♀️ (💋)
the Reporter 👨‍⚖️ (👳)

the Injured 🤕 (👺)
the Hobby Filmer 📷 (🃏)
the Best Buddy 👨‍❤️‍👨 (👶)
the Camera Man 🎥 (👁)
the Assistant 👜 (🙇)
a Hooligan 🎆 (👤)
the Police man 👮 (💂)
Went back to training
❌ Kicked out
🏃 Playing
Players in the tournament
a Defender ✋️ (👷)
You are a defender (👷). Since defenders stay close to each other, you will know the other defenders, if there are any.
As the game ends, a fast football hits {0} in the face, making him pass out immediately. Seems like {0} could defend the goal but not himself!
The defenders are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0} to make him a hooligan but {0} decides he likes his way of violence more and punches your newest member in the face.
You try to aim a ball at {0}'s face, but the goalkeeper gets it in time! Unlucky for him, the goal is free and someone shoots the ball in there!
You wanted {0} to become a hooligan, so you send {1} his way. However, {0} just likes football too much!
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.
You tried to support {0} last game but you find him on the ranks and not on the play field...?
was
The game ends. As everyone leaves the stadium the players see {0} lying unconscious in the grass outside.
The game ends. As everyone leaves the stadium the players see {0} lying unconscious in the grass outside.
Odd.... Instead of staying in line, {0} leaves his position and never comes back...
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
is getting kicked out.
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a tournament! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @greywolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no tournament running. Start a new one with /startgame or start a chaos tournament with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
No reporter! You are pretty useless now... :(
Time's up!
You are the dreamer (🏹). You like to come up with your own theories on who is paired with who, only that this tournament, your theory comes true!
You are the naked (🎭). You forgot your shirt this tournament but lucky for you, you can choose someone whose shirt you will pick up once he leaves the tournament.
You are the Striker (🎯). Your fast reflexes and speed help you while playing football.
You are the salty Holland (🔪). Your team didn't qualify for this tournament. Out of anger, you decided to ruin the tournament... For EVERYONE!!!!!!
The dreamer decided, you and {0} make the perfect couple. What's even worse, he is right! You can win together, but if {0} leaves the competition, so will you.
The dreamer decided, you and {0} should be together and ever. Fate has it this tournament, he is right. You can win together, but if {0} leaves the competition, so will you.
The football community has decided you should leave the tournament. As the striker, you can strike someone in the face before you leave...!
{0}'s abilities fail him as he cannot strike anyone in time....
{0} decided he would leave the tournament with his head high and won't strike anyone.
The community is shocked as {0} runs up to {1} and kicks him in the face. {1} cannot play anymore... {2}
You've been fouled by someone! Before you go down in pain, you can strike someone... make it quick!
The pain was too much for {0} as he couldn't strike back.
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breaths, they can't decide who to shoot... and accept their fate.
Gasping in pain {0} gets back up and kicks {1} in the face hoping for some revenge! {2}
The offenders decided the striker would be an easy target but they were wrong. The striker managed to kick {0} back before going down in pain!
The offenders decided the striker would be an easy target but they were wrong. The striker managed to kick {0} back!
The offenders tried to foul someone who is even more salty than them. {0} got knocked out instead!
One of the Hollands managed to sneak into the tournament and attack {0} last game. The salty Holland kicks someone out (literally) again! {1}
You tried to let your anger on {0} out, only to find you couldn't hit him because the goalkeeper was in the way...
You wanted to make {1} a hooligan but you decided on the wrong person! {0} is the striker and kicks you for even daring to try...
You send {0} to convince {1} violence is awesome, but {1} has his own sense of destruction. You loose one member as the salty Holland fouls him...
As you eye your chosen player carefully, he notices this and comes closer to you. You think it's to thank you, but instead he slaps you down.
You decide to support {0} only to get salt sprayed in the eyes. Your recovery will take long...
The football player see {0} lying in the middle of the field with red, puffy eyes. Hopefully, he can make a full recovery someday...
The naked {0} has picked up one of the other defenders shirts!
{0} has left the tournament. You pick up his shirt and become a defender! Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The naked {0} picked up one of the hooligans shirts! He is now one of you!
{0} has left the competition. You pick up his shirt and become a hooligan just like {0} was. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The naked {0} has picked up one of the offenders shirts and is now one of you!
{0} has left the competition. You pick up his shirt and become an offender just like {0} was. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The salty Holland got his revenge as the competition is ruined for everyone!!!
Who do you want to foul this game?
With {0} leaving the tournament, {1} decides not to play anymore and rushes to his lovers. They both leave the stadium in harmony, side by side to play somewhere else. {2}
Whose shirt do you want to pick up after he leaves?
Which player do you want to be the perfect couple? Choose the first player
Who do you want to be the perfect couple? Choose the second player
the Striker ⚽️ (🎯)
Dreamer 🛌 (🏹)
the Salty Holland 🇳🇱 (🔪)
the Naked 😳 (🎭)
You have become the best buddy . Your best friend is {0}.
The dreamers love-fantasy becomes reality as the only people standing are his couple!
After everyone left the stadium, {0} is left lying on the ranks, the imprint of a ball in his face. Seems like the hooligans tried to make the Striker join last game... Well, {1}.
One of the hooligans tried to convince you last game, but your love to football is too strong.
You are already on the wait list for {0}.
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.\nWhile waiting, why not browse the store? https://teespring.com/stores/werewolf-for-telegram
A new game is starting in {0}.
As the game ends, {1} tries to get away from {0} but cannot. {0} pulls a sack of salt out and tosses it into {0}'s mouth. What a display... o_o
Everyone in the tournament has died... No one wins this time, maybe next one...
As the game ends, {0} takes out his salt and assaults {1}. However, he didn't expect him to fight back in the last minute. Both players are left injured, there is no winner... :(
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.

You have successfully joined the tournament in {0}

You are the Fifa Manager (🎖). Once you have revealed your imperial role to the other players, your vote will count twice. Of course, since fair play is on your mind, you are on the football-players side.

You are the spoiled brat (👑). Only reason, you are in a football team in the first place is your rich father. If they try to give you a red card, you will tell them "My father will hear about this" and they think about it twice.
You are the amateur player (🤕). This is your first tournament, so you don't really know what's happening. Because you're so nervous, you might get your vote right or not. (50%)

You are the paparazzi (🔮). You love some bad publicity, so you are on the offenders side. Every game, you can report on someone and find out if they are offenders, the "good" reporter or normal players.
You are the weather man (⚒). You can cancel a game due to bad weather. Though it's a lie only the offenders will fall for, so every other person can do their actions.

You are the bully (⚡️), always having a person you hate at the moment. You are part of the offender-team but with your special ability you have the chance (20%) to convert other players into offenders as well, instead of fouling them.

You are the Youngster (🐶). You are talented but quick-tempered. The other offenders love you for your spirit and technic. If you get red a red card, they will be enraged and foul two people next game.

As the football community tries to vote {0}, he says loud and clear "MY FATHER WILL HEAR FROM IT!!". Everyone realized their error and no one wants to be on {0}'s fathers bad side, so they over think their decision.
You try to report on {0}, but he is really boring... He isn't the other reporter or an offender. :(
{0} shows everyone his business card. Everyone sees he's the FIFA manager, so they bow before their mighty money giver. From now on, {0}'s votes for lynching will count twice.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as the FIFA manager.
Reveal
Would you like to lie about the weather now?
As the football community talks, the weather man {0} speaks up, saying next game there will be a thunder storm. Everyone knows it's a lie except for the offenders who will be disabled.
the Fifa Manager 👔 (🎖)
the Spoiled Brat 👶 (👑)

the Amateur Player 😰 (🤕)
the Weather Man ⛈ (⚒)
the Bully 👊 (⚡️)
the Youngster 👦 (🐶)
As the offenders want to foul {0}, {1} has a better idea and convinces him to join the offenders too! Beginning with next game, {0} will be an offender.
The offenders wanted to foul you, but the bully decided they need another team mate, so you joined them instead.
As the next football match starts, the bully's work is done and you become an offender!

You are the Fifa Manager (🎖). Once you have revealed your imperial role to the other players, your vote will count twice. Of course, since fair play is on your mind, you are on the football-players side.

You are the spoiled brat (👑). Only reason, you are in a football team in the first place is your rich father. If they try to give you a red card, you will tell them "My father will hear about this" and they think about it twice.

You are the paparazzi (🔮). You love some bad publicity, so you are on the offenders side. Every game, you can report on someone and find out if they are offenders, the "good" reporter or normal players.
You are the amateur player (🤕). This is your first tournament, so you don't really know what's happening. Because you're so nervous, you might get your vote right or not. (50%)

You are the paparazzi (🔮). You love some bad publicity, so you are on the offenders side. Every game, you can report on someone and find out if they are offenders, the "good" reporter or normal players.
You are the weather man (⚒). You can cancel a game due to bad weather. Though it's a lie only the offenders will fall for, so every other person can do their actions.

You are the bully (⚡️), always having a person you hate at the moment. You are part of the offender-team but with your special ability you have the chance (20%) to convert other players into offenders as well, instead of fouling them.

You are the Youngster (🐶). You are talented but quick-tempered. The other offenders love you for your spirit and technic. If you get red a red card, they will be enraged and foul two people next game.

You wanted to convert {0} to your team but instead your newest mate {1} gets fouled by him!!
{0} wanted to support {1} on the field. Instead of supporting, the Salty Holland has two people to foul! Both cannot play anymore... :(
The assistant {0} was sneaking around the play field when the offenders found him and hit him on his head...
A red sun rises. Blood has been spilled last game. The weather man {0} got fouled by the Salty Holland!
{0} wanted to convince the Salty Holland to become a hooligan, but he regrets this now as he is on his way to the hospital!
The dreamer tried to sleep through a game but the Salty Holland used his chance to foul {0}...

The line referee was attacked by the Salty Holland. As he showed him the yellow card, the Holland took it out of {0}'s hand and tore it apart. He doesn't acknowledge the authority of this tournament anyway!
{0} was protecting everyone but himself from the fast ball that flew right in his face! Your goalkeeper managed to catch the ball but the costs were high!
The salty Holland decided that especially the trainers should pay for his team not making it into the competition. {0} will someday hopefully be okay again...

The Salty Holland was so angry his team didn't make it that he targeted the Fifa Manager! {0} gets beaten up trying to talk himself out of the situation. When someone finally finds him, he is still talking to himself!
No one is really unhappy that the Salty Holland went after the spoiled brat. He wasn't a great asset after all... {0} is on his way to a hospital.

Someone gets a distressed call from the owner of the stadium saying someone stole his son's phone and used it to call him. They find the spoiled brat lying in the showers, the destroyed phone next to him. {0} is severely injured.

The football players find the reporter unconscious on one of the ranks. The Salty Holland smiles to himself. Now, no one can report bad things about his team anymore, he thinks to himself. {0} cannot play this tournament anymore.
While chasing a good story, the Paparazzi didn't expect his secret team mates to turn on him. Oh well, {0}'s injuries will make a good story as well.
{0} tried to reason with the offenders, but it's useless. They attack him, making him unable to shoot more scandalous photos.
{0} only wanted to play with his buddy. He didn't expect himself to end up in an ambulance on the way to the hospital. :(
The saltiness of the Holland doesn't even make a stop from the police! As {0} tries to check on a particular player, he gets injured severely.
The police man tried to check the wrong person out. {0} is found in a locker, but his gun cannot be found anywhere... :S Hopefully, the Salty Holland didn't keep it.
The Hooligans tried to convert one of the offenders, but {0} got injured in the process...
As {0} tries to convince an offender, the offender decides to do the police's job and made sure {0} would not be able to participate in the tournament again.

The hooligans wanted to add another violent member to their team. Too late they realized that their choice was even more violent than them. {0} was fouled and had to be send to the hospital cause of that mistake!
{0} tried to pursue the Holland into joining the hooligans. He didn't realize his error fast enough and got injured badly by the Holland.
{0} tried to protect one of the players from any harm, only he didn't realize that player would harm him. The next moment, the others find their goal keeper rubbing his salted eyes, tears in them.
{0} tried to protect one of the offenders. They made sure he got his revenge and cannot go on in the competition anymore. :(
As only the striker was left, {1} tries to foul this last person {0} but he didn't see the ball lying close to the striker. The ball hits him in the face and he cannot finish his mission anymore..
As only the striker was left, {1} made sure to keep all balls out of reach as he fouls {0} one last time before the tournament is over.

{1} and {0} enter the final game of the tournament. Only they are left. {0} tries to throw a Molotov cocktail at the policeman, but fails. He gets hand cuffed and send to prison for a long time... {1} smiles fondly as he realizes all hooligans are gone.
